    • fr.cyu.cyfight.game.cell.BaseCell

    public class BaseCell
extends java.lang.Object
implements Cell
    Base cell for the game grid
    Author:
    Mika INISAN

      • BaseCell

        public BaseCell​(int x,
                int y,
                boolean blocking,
                boolean exit,
                boolean entry,
                boolean highPriority)
        Constructs a base cell.
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate of the cell
        y - y coordinate of the cell
        blocking - true if the cell is a wall
        exit - true if the cell is an exit
        entry - true if the cell is an entry
        highPriority - true is the cell has higher priority than it's entities

      • BaseCell

        public BaseCell​(boolean blocking,
                boolean exit,
                boolean entry,
                boolean highPriority)
        Constructs a base cell.
        Parameters:
        blocking - true if the cell is a wall
        exit - true if the cell is an exit
        entry - true if the cell is an entry
        highPriority - true is the cell has higher priority than it's entities
